name: V2_Ch1_FSM_ExistenceTheorem
intent: Formalize the necessary and sufficient conditions for existence of FSMs.

constraints.unique_mode: FSM is unique up to Ω-symmetric transformations.
constraints.stable_fixed_point: FSM must be a stable fixed point of χ-flow.
